name: EGGG
description:
This is a simple remake of a classic Game & Watch game Egg. It has everything you would ever want: eggs, chickens, basket, a gun, clear sky,  a dead body, trees and a few tractors in the distance!

Contains mild spoopy elements.

You can check out the development process on my youtube channel.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz7rHMb-VnNX3MNHrvyx92g

The PC build was tested on Quest 2 with Air Link. Some binding might be a little off on other systems, unfortunately I don't have hardware to test it for other platforms.

The Quest 2 build can be loaded through sidequest an AppLabs link will be added later
